overview: Hunter has arrived at Lex's office and he massages Lex and decides he should seduce him into having sex right there in the office. Jett is at his desk working when Julian walks in with a confident swagger and tells him he cannot resist him and pulls Jett into his sweaty body.  Connor has no money and seeing an opportunity Fernando seduces him and tells him he will forgive his debt if he fucks him. Colby and Rego want to spice things up a bit and try fucking each other.
title: Office Stress Release
